\documentclass{article}


\usepackage{ctex} % for displaying Chinese


\input{preset_tikz}

\newlength{\nodeDistance}
\setlength{\nodeDistance}{50pt}

\newlength{\smallestHeight}
\setlength{\smallestHeight}{30pt}

\newlength{\smallestWidth}
\setlength{\smallestWidth}{55pt}

\tikzset{block2/.style={%
  shape=rectangle,%
  draw,%
  node distance = 0pt,
  % minimum width = \stackWidth,
  }
}

\tikzstyle{my node text}=[%
  text centered,
  font = \bf\LARGE
]

\tikzstyle{my node}=[%
  my node text,
  line width=1pt,
  anchor=center,
  rectangle, % shape of the node
  % fill=black!10,
  draw=black, % color of the edge
  very thick, % thick edges
  inner sep=5pt,  % there is no extra space around the text, as it
                  % it has already specified the minimum size of the node
]

\tikzstyle{hide node text}=[%
  color = white
]

\tikzstyle{hide node}=[
  hide node text,
  draw = none,
]


\begin{document}
\include{pipeline}

\end{document}
